1185430 1187030 Oh, this dream is ruining my life.
1192230 1193570 God, I'm not getting any sleep.
1203450 1206890 So the woman in my dream, her name is Iris, right?
1210930 1213950 I, uh, I think I'm dreaming about her.
1215990 1217370 The thing is, I never even met her.
1217370 1219390 I don't even know if she's alive.
1221430 1229930 Either go home and find out about Grandma and hope that stops the dreams, or stay here and die in your sleep.
1291560 1297660 Charlie took your room a while ago, and my files are in his room, so I made up the pullout for you.
1298700 1300300 Yeah, yeah, no, that sounds totally fine.
1301340 1304780 Uh, hey, do we still have that box of Mom's old stuff?
1305320 1309100 It had, uh, some photos, like an address book.
1311220 1312260 Uh, why do you want that?
1312620 1313620 Oh, it's not a big deal.
1313700 1315880 I just, I thought I saw it lying around here somewhere.
1321880 1329020 Okay, this is gonna sound really, really weird, but I, uh, I just need to find Mom's mom, Iris.
1336980 1340680 And you know, I got rid of those boxes years ago, after Mom left.
1348400 1349640 It's so nice to see you.
1355040 1356900 Look, your sister just got home.
1358320 1359440 I can, I can drive you.
1359520 1361120 I was wanting to see them anyways.
1362680 1366220 Hey, if you're gonna see your cousins, please don't talk about Iris.
1378580 1381220 Can you just take these out, please?
1381420 1382220 I'm trying to talk to you.
1384860 1387220 You haven't said anything this entire time.
1391940 1393440 I mean, I'm only coming home for holidays.
1394220 1395260 I have to tell you something.
1396200 1398100 But you have to promise not to tell Dad.
1406740 1408700 Can you just promise me you won't tell Dad?
1434100 1435660 If I don't get my grades up...
1435660 1437460 This is kind of a big moment for me.
1439660 1442620 You're a class president, Miss Valedictorian.
1442740 1446220 If I don't get my grades up, I will lose my scholarship.
1454520 1459560 Every time I close my eyes, I have this same recurring nightmare about Iris.
1463960 1465500 I mean, it has to mean something.
1470460 1473080 I dreamed a hot dog ate me last night.
1473360 1474860 Like, the hot dog was eating me.
1480660 1483780 Dude, can you just do something?
1490520 1491780 Do you remember what happened last night?
1501380 1503340 Oh my gosh, hey, can you help us look?
1503400 1505220 And just watch your feet where you're stepping.
1506680 1508660 I gotta talk to your dad first.
1508940 1510080 What the fuck are you doing home?
1510260 1512740 Oh, dude, she's fucking out of school.
1515260 1516780 Eric, dude, have you looked anywhere?
1518940 1520620 Oh, but look who's down here.
1526640 1528900 So, we had to prom-pose him with Jenny-go.
1535300 1536840 Oh, he met her in Junior Lifeguards.
1538320 1541300 Charlie, I didn't know you were doing Junior Lifeguards.
1541320 1542880 Okay, so what are you gonna wear?
1543800 1545540 I'm just gonna keep it simple.
1557980 1559380 How long are you here for?
1578020 1579280 Oh, it's so good to see you.
1580540 1581260 I was gonna make some lunch.
1581660 1585220 No, actually, I came here because I wanted to talk to you about your mother.
1586380 1588720 I know you don't like to talk about her.
1591240 1595760 It's just that I've been having this recurring nightmare about her.
1596140 1597720 Oh, honey, it's probably just a stress.
1600080 1605420 Okay, but the weird thing is, I've been dreaming about a real place from 50 years ago.
1605560 1607240 It was like a restaurant called The Skyview.
1612550 1613750 Did Iris tell you about it?
1617210 1618490 Maybe if I could talk to her...
1620070 1621530 Steph is dreaming about Grandma Iris.
1626450 1630010 Stephanie, Iris Campbell is a very deeply disturbed woman.
1630630 1634170 Look, if I could just talk to her, then maybe I can get these dreams to stop.
1636190 1637650 What happened that was so bad?
1637710 1639730 For one thing, she's the reason that your mother's so screwed up.
1640170 1641910 Look, I just don't want to talk about this anymore, okay?
1642070 1644130 Uncle Howard, please, I just need to know.
1644910 1653690 Look, Stephanie, after our father died, Iris just snapped.
1654930 1656630 She wouldn't let us go to school.
1656930 1658470 She locked us inside the house.
1659110 1662170 She obsessed about all the horrific ways we could die.
1662970 1666718 And eventually it got so bad, I mean so bad,
1666918 1670325 that the state came in and they took your mother and I away from her.
1672210 1675384 She tracked us all through foster care, and when the kids were born,
1675584 1678736 she started sending us these horrible letters,
1678736 1682910 that were full of obituaries and these disturbing pictures of dead bodies.
1683090 1685350 We had to move so she couldn't contact us anymore.
1687030 1692450 So, uh, do you still have any of those letters?
1699870 1702890 That woman is a sick and dangerous person.
1703810 1708250 And for your well-being and your safety, stay the hell away from her.
1717140 1720300 I'm sure he'd love to be in the living room right now.
1722460 1724680 How did he ever get in there?
1725320 1726900 I need you to help me.
1735320 1737520 My whole life is falling apart because of this dream.
1738280 1741060 And not only that, I feel like I'm losing my mind.
1741420 1743380 Please, you are the only person who can help me.
1743700 1745960 Howard would never forgive me if I put you in touch with Iris.
1754630 1760750 Whatever you do, do not look in the bottom drawer of the dining room cabinet.
1858600 1862960 Hi, um, I'm here to see Iris Campbell.
1863180 1864300 Did you not see the signs?
1864960 1867320 Uh, uh, yeah, yes, I did.
1867620 1870620 Then get the fuck out of here.
1883440 1884600 It's not you I'm afraid of.
2006180 2007600 I can see your mother in you.
2019110 2020330 Trying to trick me, aren't you?
2022510 2024010 Getting me to let my guard down.
2045840 2048100 She left when I was ten.
2048260 2050540 So we don't see her anymore.
2061029 2064910 I'm actually here because I've been dreaming about the sky view.
2067370 2070930 Yeah, every single night for the past two months it's the same dream.
2071570 2079350 In it, you're on a date but then the dance floor breaks and then there's an explosion and then you fall and die.
2087730 2095290 Years ago at the sky view I got a glimpse into the future and saw what death was about to do.
2112660 2117740 These past two years have been absolutely magical and that's all because of you.
2127300 2129220 The whole building is going to come down.
2138200 2140220 What the fuck is wrong with you?
2178500 2180180 I saved a lot of lives that night.
2182420 2183280 They were meant to be saved.
2185200 2186720 They closed the restaurant after that.
2204120 2206780 But death doesn't like it when you fuck with his plans.
2207340 2211220 So over the years he came back and he killed everyone who was there that night.
2217230 2219550 Did you say death came back?
2219910 2221590 He's a relentless son of a bitch.
2222450 2224250 Won't stop till he finishes the job.
2224310 2226670 But I taught myself how to see him coming.
2230090 2232470 Been keeping him at bay for years now.
2239850 2241290 Got the diagnosis two months ago.
2242790 2244270 That's when I started having my dream.
2246290 2248830 Okay, but why am I dreaming about what you saw?
2249330 2251490 Maybe my cancer passed my premonition on to you.
2251570 2254090 Maybe it's fate's demented sense of humor.
2255150 2259830 What matters is that when the universe speaks you pay attention.
2283490 2285330 He thinks I'm distracted because you're here.
2286730 2288830 I have to teach you everything in this book.
2289230 2291350 It'll take some time to learn the basics.
2291890 2293010 So you'll need to stay here.
2293910 2295210 The outside world is too dangerous.
2295350 2297290 I haven't stepped out there in twenty years.
2297430 2299330 In here, we can be safe.
2311690 2315789 I have to get back to school, but, you know, I'll come back and I'll visit.
2317530 2318830 I won't be alive that long.
2321169 2324250 Death is coming for our family.
2330090 2333070 I think I made a mistake.
2333470 2336110 I think it was probably just a dream.
2372900 2375580 It will show you everything you need to know to keep our family safe.
2412400 2414140 Her face really exploded right in front of you.
2430330 2432190 I never should have went there.
2432430 2433730 Honey, there's no need to apologize.
2434770 2437370 I'm so sorry you had to go through that.
2441450 2443390 She said something to me before she died.
2443470 2445150 She said death was coming for our family.
2452660 2453940 I just didn't think she'd show up.
2497110 2499570 If she's going to Uncle Howard's house, then I'm not.
2499810 2500730 You can get a ride with Dad.
2501490 2502690 You're not even going to talk to her?
2504530 2505790 You don't remember her like I do.
2508470 2510990 Charlie, she abandoned us and now she rolls in here?
2511530 2513570 After all these years and wants to act like nothing happened?
2517470 2519150 Because who would do that, right?
2524770 2527570 I tried calling you so many times and nothing.
2528750 2529630 You used to be best friends.
2533290 2536790 I've just been distracted the last couple of months because of this and this nightmare.
2537650 2539010 It's been like this ever since you left.
2540710 2543270 You're mad at Mom, but you haven't been around either.
2643180 2644820 Now you got it, watch out for splinters.
2664700 2665900 I'm so glad you made it.
2691770 2693210 Are you trying to kill my brother?
2698230 2699250 The important thing is that you're here.
2712780 2714700 You don't get to pick the one you get.
2714700 2718120 You just got to love the one that you got.
2719820 2724620 Now, our mother, she lived alone until the day that she died.
2725580 2730082 And her death should be a reminder to all of us to enjoy life,
2730082 2736320 and spend the time that we have together because we're not going to get any back.

2882738 2885163 and it's got to be better than bouncing around trailer parks.

2894630 2896410 It's never too late for a second chance.

2929810 2932250 Hey, guys, come show us your back flip.
3012240 3013580 I'm glad you decided to come.
3053600 3056720 And he shall wipe away every tear from their eyes.
3124260 3126300 I found these papers in Iris' book.
3126940 3132101 They are obituaries and articles for the people who were at the Skyview,
3132301 3134479 on the night that Iris had her premonition.
3135660 3139700 Each one of these people went on to die in some weird and messed up way.
3139800 3143800 And not only that, they all died in the same order as Iris' premonition.
3144540 3149200 Hundreds of people were supposed to die that night, but Iris stopped the disaster.
3150880 3153540 So, death came back for them one by one.
3154620 3158820 Since there were so many survivors, it took years for death to get to all of them.
3159220 3160740 But eventually it got to Iris.
3162720 3164420 I mean, she was the last to die in the premonition.
3165280 3167200 It was her and a little boy.
3171700 3175300 She single-handedly held off death for decades.
3177960 3180360 I don't think this is the appropriate time for this.
3180660 3183140 Yeah, I mean, none of this even has anything to do with us, right?
3184600 3186320 It has everything to do with us.
3187060 3191720 Because death took so long to make its way through the survivors, these people went on to have families.
3191960 3193780 Families that they never should have had.
3201240 3204280 Death is coming for us because we were never supposed to exist.
3205400 3209240 Okay, so why everybody in this room is on death's hit list?
3209380 3211300 Bobby, Doc, that's what she's saying.
3212500 3215280 Dad and Aunt Brenda are safe because they're not part of Iris' bloodline.
3217040 3221940 Following the pattern, death makes its way down each branch by age.
3222320 3227260 So because Uncle Howard was the oldest, it'll start with his family first, meaning Eric, you're next.
3228480 3230900 Then it'll go for Julia, then Bobby.
3232100 3237440 Then it'll come for our branch, starting with Darlene, then me, then Charlie.
3246540 3249860 I mean, you're turning our dad's death into some kind of fucked up conspiracy theory.
3252060 3254060 It's not, it's not a conspiracy theory.
3256480 3258540 I can't listen to this for one more minute.
3259100 3264060 That crazy woman's nonsense has caused enough pain and suffering for this family.
3265560 3267300 Aunt Brenda, please just leave it alone.
3267480 3271380 Okay, in Iris' book, she mentions somebody who cheated death and survived.
3278020 3279240 I'll be taking care of this.
3290320 3291840 But sometimes I really hate you.
3312460 3318700 I know how convincing all of this can be, but it's not real.
3321360 3323120 I know Iris taught you all of this.
3324100 3328920 Don't let my mom's beliefs derail your life the same way they did mine.
3332830 3337330 Thank you so much for that advice, but I really don't need a mom anymore.
3362220 3363120 I need you to lock up.
3363640 3365000 And don't touch any of my liquor.
3365160 3367260 No, no, you didn't say anything about locking up.
3368000 3369580 I didn't say shit about closing, dude.
3371460 3372740 I hope you burn in hell.
3378860 3382300 I come in as a favor to that asshole, and now he wants me to lock up.
3392680 3396160 Like and subscribe and all the things.
3480560 3490350 No, I can't forget this evening or your face as you were leaving, but
3490350 3495310 I guess that's just the way the story goes.
3496890 3506430 And now it's only fair that I should let you know what you should know.
3508450 3514770 I can't live, if living is without you.

3662040 3662880 I don't know where he is.
3665920 3667100 Well, have you heard from him?
3675300 3676220 I need to check on him.
3682200 3683380 I think he's gone to voicemail.
3687730 3690230 My friend just set the test recorder to burn down last night.
3699800 3701280 Oh, yeah, no, of course it's you.
3713250 3715790 Fire said I was lucky as fuck that I was wearing that leather jacket.
3727590 3729590 You're blowing up my phone like a goddamn stalker.
3729630 3730110 What do you want me to do?
3737410 3739730 Maybe death's not actually coming for our family.
3740290 3742070 Because that would be fucking crazy.
3757620 3760040 Just because death didn't kill you last night doesn't mean that you're safe.
3762060 3763460 Stay away from that tree trimmer!
3766680 3768280 Gonna move on its own, Steph?
3768300 3769240 Is that what it's gonna do?
3772000 3773160 And stay away from these kids.

3781620 3785429 The trimmer could fall and hit the leaf blower guy,
3785629 3790571 which causes him to blow stuff into the kids' eyes and then take the ball into his face.
3808990 3810290 Oh, wait, let me see that.
3810670 3812190 Eric, just stay away from the truck.
3818210 3819990 But it's such a beautiful truck!
3841520 3842660 I'm just trying to help you.
3845340 3847420 Honestly, we're so done with your garbage.
3848720 3853100 For the 1500th time, no one gives a shit about your stupid little death curse, okay?
3853100 3857100 So take a hint and leave us alone, because death's not coming for our family.
3964310 3966390 I screwed up the order, and now Julia's dead.
3970560 3973640 What happened was traumatic and awful.
3983470 3989530 Stephanie, you were only wrong about the order, because there's something you shouldn't know.
4001270 4002670 I'm sorry, what are you talking about?
4003390 4008410 And, Stephanie, I didn't believe you, so I didn't say anything to you, and now my little girl's dead.
4008670 4010190 Well, I don't understand why you had an affair.
4011350 4013930 You and your father and I were having such a hard time.
4014550 4016630 But it was good, because I got you.
4016890 4017670 I got you out of it.
4017690 4018730 I was gonna read that, but I'm just gonna read that.
4018730 4022290 It doesn't matter, because Howard loved you so, so much.
4040710 4042330 You don't know what we're going through.
4043670 4045730 What, is this why you always wanted to play catch?
4055190 4062030 So, that means that if it's going in the right order, then I'm next, right?
4071740 4074480 I don't think that I can.
4074680 4076580 I mean, I thought I did, but I don't...
4080360 4082960 I mean, you predicted exactly what was gonna happen.
4084660 4087580 You just got the order wrong, because you didn't have all the information, Charlie.
4092340 4095500 The trimmer, the blower, the soccer ball, like...
4095500 4099880 It was like there were pieces to a puzzle, and she just had to put them together, you know what I mean?
4100740 4103880 Darling, please, do not encourage this.
4107200 4109760 I mean, it's everything in Iris' book, it's...
4109760 4112860 It's like, it's like an equation, it's math.
4113059 4117380 Stephanie, if you can see how all of this fits together, we might have a chance.
4117380 4124820 Steph, you devastated this family when you walked out, but we've been okay without you.
4125360 4128360 I'm begging you not to traumatize our kids anymore.
4144500 4150691 I can appreciate that our family is clearly gonna need some counseling in the future, but...
4150891 4154350 can we focus on the fact that we're all about to die, right?
4156430 4163020 I mean, Steph, didn't you say that Iris knew someone that cheated death or something?
4172780 4178100 J.B. found someone who survived, but it doesn't say anything about who this J.B. was or...
4178100 4179160 Wait a minute, I know that name.
4179740 4181672 My mom used to write me letters,
4181872 4187139 and she sometimes would talk about a friend of hers named J.B. who worked at a hospital.
4189700 4197880 Um, something, uh, something river hospital, uh, uh, deep river, uh, peace river hospital, uh, clear...
4200660 4201880 Shit, it's like an hour away.
4203460 4205000 I'm gonna go find him and talk to him myself.
4206380 4208820 That's it, okay, yeah, yeah, let's, let's go.
4214000 4215920 You need to stay here with your mom and save her.
4216740 4218820 Yeah, fuck that, are you kidding me?
4218820 4220140 I'm not staying here by myself.
4220560 4222760 It's too dangerous on the road for you, you can't...
4222760 4226020 No, I read Gammy's death book, okay, alright?
4226340 4230260 I mean, there's like a thousand house-related deaths in that thing, man.
4230380 4233600 You trip down the stairs, fall...
4233600 4236960 down a toilet or something, I don't, I don't know, but I'm not, I'm not...
4236960 4238220 No way, I'm not staying here.
4243100 4244420 Okay, okay, we'll go slow, we'll go slow.
4244480 4245580 I'm gonna go open up the truck.
4252660 4254400 Be careful, the steps are slippery sometimes.
4258000 4259720 Any of you fuckers doing nut check?
4261440 4265480 You made cookies in that thing with peanut butter in them just a few days ago.
4266300 4270580 This poor bastard so much as even touches a nut, his throat is gonna close up tight and...
4271740 4273340 You understand, where's the peanut butter?
4277400 4279440 I'm so sorry, Bobby, I just...
4297500 4299320 It was good, I get it.
4318820 4320260 Tell him we just went for a ride with Mom.
4321600 4323100 At least it'll buy us some time.
4327200 4328640 Death doesn't get us your dead will.
4341290 4343130 I always keep them where I can see them.
4345840 4349780 I mean, you could've just had the real thing, but it's okay, not everyone wants to be a mom.
4354600 4355820 That I don't wanna be a mom?
4358820 4363720 Look, I was raised by a woman who taught me to see death everywhere.
4364800 4368707 I thought I could put it behind me, but then when I had you and your brother,
4368907 4373257 all I could see were a hundred different ways that you and Charlie could die.
4374100 4375700 I didn't want you to leave the house.
4376500 4378720 I would freak out on you guys over nothing.
4380980 4386072 One day, I looked at your face, and I saw the same scared little girl that I was growing up,
4386272 4388976 and I knew that if I stayed, I was gonna ruin your life.
4391400 4393260 I have no idea if I did the right thing.
4394760 4396500 But I'm here for you now.
4437140 4438860 The front desk is this way.
4445870 4449250 Hi, um, we're looking for JB.
4452270 4455010 The front desk told us we could find him down here, is that you?
4469080 4471060 But my friends call me JB.
4471700 4474100 I've been waiting for you, Stephanie.
4488680 4490500 I was sorry to hear about Iris.
4504930 4511190 I went to work that night.
4511190 4514850 JB, honey, I told you, you gotta stay back there while I'm on stage.
4515150 4516930 I wasn't supposed to be there.
4548250 4554050 So all that time, she wasn't just protecting our family, she was protecting you too.
4555350 4557370 Years later, she tracked me down.
4562270 4564030 I helped her fortify her cabin.
4566630 4572090 I even helped her get the best medical care I could, considering her condition.
4572630 4575730 Iris said that you'd found somebody who stopped death and survived.
4577890 4579990 And how do we do that?
4585670 4589510 If you take a life, you get the time that person had left.
4590130 4592290 No, I'm not gonna kill someone.
4592290 4593810 Maybe we should let the guy finish.
4594130 4597550 Then to truly break the cycle, you have to die.
4601030 4608770 A long time ago, a young woman named Kimberly Corman found herself on death's list, just like you.
4609430 4612590 And when her turn finally came, she died.
4614390 4619190 But her doctor managed to bring her back, and that broke the chain.
4619690 4620850 Well, alright then, we'll do that.
4627230 4632849 And if you fuck with death and lose, things can get very messy.
4639560 4640940 There has to be another way.
4641440 4642619 Please, you have to help us.
4643099 4645740 For years, people have been coming to me for advice.
4650460 4652900 And now I'm sick, just like Iris.
4655680 4658500 Fact is, you're all gonna die.
4659320 4662160 And after that, I will too.
4666060 4669090 Now that my old friend is gone, I'm retiring.
4670090 4671230 You're just gonna leave us here?
4671590 4677110 I intend to enjoy the time I have left.
4677770 4680690 And I suggest you do the same.
4708520 4711720 There has to be something here.
4711800 4713360 There has to be another answer.
4722900 4725140 Am I the only guy that just listened to that dude?
4727600 4730660 We resuscitate him, and then boom, you're all off death's list.
4731580 4733060 There has to be something else, right?
4733140 4735340 I mean, there has to be another solution, right, Steph?
4738340 4740620 No, there's nothing else we can do.
4743020 4747100 Hey, you gotta trust me on this, okay?
4749540 4752760 Look, Iris found a way to hold death off for decades.
4761140 4762640 He was charismatic, and you know that as well.
4782890 4784150 I don't think I like this.
4784230 4785710 Hey, dude, we're in a hospital.
4787450 4790530 We kill you, they bring you back, everybody's safe.
4792170 4794170 That is literally the opposite of keeping you safe.
4796530 4798570 You want to kill someone and take the time they have left?
4800370 4801910 How would you even know how many years they have?
4819790 4823010 Look, bottom line, flatline is your best option.
4824410 4825310 What do you have to lose?
4830920 4832960 How would we even do that?
4852010 4861920 Look, all right, if I'm going out, it's not going to be on those sort of insulted bitches,
4877870 4879530 Oh, you've got to be kidding me.
